commands.transconfig.querytranslator: The current translator in use is %s
translator.option.distance.desc: Entities or signs beyond the translation distance will not be translated
translator.optionscreen.title: Translation Options
translator.option.auto_tooltip.desc: When enabled, item info will be translated after hovering over an item for over 0.4 seconds
translator.option.sign_combine.desc: If enabled, it will combine other lines of the sign for translation, making the result more accurate but potentially losing some ending content. If disabled, each line will be translated separately, and if the translation is longer than the original, it may exceed the sign width
translator.error.baidu.52001: The request timed out. Please try again.
translator.error.baidu.52002: There was a server - side system error. Please try again.
translator.error.baidu.52003: Unauthorized user. Please check if the appid is correct or if the service is activated.
translator.error.baidu.52010: The authorized capacity of open devices is insufficient. Try again after reducing the number of devices.
translator.error.baidu.54000: Fixed parameters are incorrect. Check the access parameters.
translator.error.baidu.54001: Signature error. Please check your signature generation method.
translator.error.baidu.54003: Access frequency is restricted. Please reduce your call frequency.
translator.error.baidu.54004: Insufficient account balance. Please go to the management console to recharge your account.
translator.error.baidu.54005: Long query requests are frequent. Please reduce the sending frequency of long queries and try again after 3 seconds.
translator.error.baidu.58000: The client IP is illegal. Check if the IP address filled in the personal information is correct. You can go to Developer Information - Basic Information to modify it.
translator.error.baidu.58001: The target language direction for translation is not supported. Check if the target language is in the language list.
translator.error.baidu.69001: The uploaded image data is incorrect. The image acquisition failed. Please try again.
translator.error.baidu.69002: The image recognition timed out. Please try again.
translator.error.baidu.69003: Content recognition failed. Please try again.
translator.error.baidu.69004: The recognized content is empty. Check if there is content in the image and then try again.
translator.error.baidu.69005: The image size exceeds the limit (more than 4M). Please upload an image that meets the size requirements.
translator.error.baidu.69006: The image size does not meet the standard (the shortest side should be at least 30px and the longest side should be at most 4096px). Please upload an image that meets the size requirements.
translator.error.baidu.69007: The image format is not supported (png/jpg). Please upload a png or jpg format image.
translator.error.baidu.69008: The device number is empty. Check the cuid parameter.
translator.error.baidu.-1000: The source or target language setting is empty when initiating translation. Please check the language settings when initiating translation.
translator.error.baidu.-1001: There is an internal SDK error. The SDK is abnormal. Try re - initializing it, or contact customer service to troubleshoot the cause.
translator.error.baidu.-1002: The local image file is invalid. The image File passed in when initiating translation is illegal. It may be empty / non - existent / unreadable, etc. Please check the image File to be translated.
translator.error.baidu.-1003: The recognized bitmap is invalid. The Bitmap of the image passed in when initiating translation is illegal. It may be empty or recycled. Please check the Bitmap of the image to be translated.
translator.error.baidu.-1004: The image size exceeds the maximum supported 50M. The size of the image to be translated exceeds the limit. Please compress and use a smaller image.
translator.error.baidu.-1005: Failed to save the file. The SDK is abnormal. Try re - initializing it, or contact customer service to troubleshoot the cause.
translator.error.baidu.-1006: The network request timed out and failed. Check the network environment and try again, or contact customer service to troubleshoot the cause.
translator.error.baidu.-1007: The server returned empty. Check the network environment and try again, or contact customer service to troubleshoot the cause.
translator.error.baidu.-1008: The returned data is illegal and the parsing failed. Contact customer service to troubleshoot the cause.
translator.error.baidu.-1009: An exception occurred when sending the request (the error message will be in errorMsg). Check the network environment and try again, or contact customer service to troubleshoot the cause.
translator.error.baidu.-1010: The HTTP request failed (the statusCode will be in errorMsg). Check the network environment and try again, or contact customer service to troubleshoot the cause.
translator.error.youdao.101: Required parameters are missing. First, ensure that all required parameters are complete, and then confirm whether the parameter writing is correct.
translator.error.youdao.108: The application ID is invalid. Register an account, log in to the background to create an application and complete the binding to obtain information such as the application ID and application key.
translator.error.youdao.110: There is no valid application for the relevant service. The application is not bound to a service application. You can create a new service application. Note: The pronunciation of translation results for some services requires the tts service, which can be used only after creating a text - to - speech service in the console and binding the application.
translator.error.youdao.116: The value of the strict field is invalid. Please refer to the documentation to fill in the correct parameter value.
translator.error.youdao.201: Decryption failed, possibly due to errors in DES, BASE64, or URLDecode.
translator.error.youdao.202: Signature verification failed. If you confirm the correctness of the application ID and application key and still get 202, it is usually a coding problem. Please ensure that the translation text q is in UTF - 8 encoding.
translator.error.youdao.203: The access IP address is not in the accessible IP list
translator.error.youdao.205: The requested interface is inconsistent with the application's platform type. Ensure that the access method (Android SDK, IOS SDK, API) is consistent with the application platform type you created. If you have any questions, please refer to the getting - started guide.
